equipment_slot.description: Which equipped item to execute the action on. One of: `"mainhand"`, `"offhand"`, `"head"`, `"chest"`, `"legs"`, `"feet"`.
equipment_slot.markdownDescription: Which equipped item to execute the action on. One of: `"mainhand"`, `"offhand"`, `"head"`, `"chest"`, `"legs"`, `"feet"`.

action.description: The item action type to execute on the item stack in the specified equipment slot.
action.markdownDescription: The item action type to execute on the item stack in the specified equipment slot.

type.description:
[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/equipped_item_action)

Executes an [Item Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/equipped_item_action) on an item stack in a specified equipment slot.

Type ID: `origins:equipped_item_action`
type.markdownDescription:
[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/equipped_item_action)

Executes an [Item Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/equipped_item_action) on an item stack in a specified equipment slot.

Type ID: `origins:equipped_item_action`
